subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The undefeated Kentucky Derby prospect Gemologist returned from a three-and-a-half-month layoff for a seventh-length victory in an $80,000 allowance race at Gulfstream Park.
snippet: The undefeated Kentucky Derby prospect Gemologist returned from a three-and-a-half-month layoff for a seventh-length victory in an $80,000 allowance race at Gulfstream Park.
